title: 加拿大議員 Garnett Genuis 喺議會為香港人出聲！

replies.msg:
BREAKING: I’m moving a motion to have a Parliamentary Debate on the Situation in Hong Kong. I will speak first, and we will continue this livestream throughout the debate.

Please like and share!
https://www.facebook.com/MPGenuis/videos/244450380335986/
